## TextAreaBuilderOptions.placeholderStyle property

Style for the placeholder text.

**Signature:**

```typescript
placeholderStyle?: Style;
```

## Remarks

Uses `Style` from `@boba-cli/chapstick` to apply terminal colors and formatting to the placeholder.
